channel.title: [FM Queue] Queues and Submit thread
channel.description:
Hosting - [quote="Chloe, post:1, topic:83521"] So you want to host a Forum Game? [/quote]
^ READ THIS
To host a game please express in this thread that you want to host it. When you do so, please provide the following information: - Your game name - Who is hosting it - Size of your game - Game speed (what are the day/night cycles) - Game type (what category of mafia does it fall under).
This game has to be completed to be put in the In Review section. This includes everything, such as the OP and rolecards. A reviewer will be assigned to you after that.
[color=ligblue]Example Format[/color] -
Game Name: D&D Monster Manual Mafia Main Host: DybuDabu Game Size: 13 Game Speed: 36/12 Game Type: Standard
Game Name: Host(s): Game Size: Game Speed: Game Type:
[details="Game Types"] Current Game Types Include: FoL: The Website's premiere game, handled by the FOL Balance Team SFoL: A variant of FoL Vanilla FM: Games with only vanilla roles that are open/semi open. [List of roles](https://www.mafiacolosseum.com/threads/mafia-colosseum-basic-roles.299/) Standard FM: Like Vanilla but closed. Special FM: An FM game that does not fit the above categories. Mash/Mini Mash: Like any of the FMs but 20+ people for Mini and 30+ people for Mash
Subcategories that exist but are not needed: Anon: all alt game Comp: Competitive Game
For a more detailed explanation of game types, read the [Official Hosting Guide](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/updated-official-hosting-guide/83521) [/details]
[color=ligblue]Starting[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Host(s)]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Status]**|**[Reviewer]**| **[AltMod]** | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |Didney Worl Mafia|GGhana, Katze|19|48/24|Special (MU)|Ongoing|Osieorb18|x |Please Don‚Äôt Hate Me FM: Mad17 Edition|clonedcheese|17|TBD|Vanilla?|After Sus Jungle|Geyde|TBD|
[color=ligblue]Waiting to Start[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Host(s)]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**|**[AltMod]** | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |'Holy Shit' Sorcerer17|Geyde|17|48/24|Vanilla|After Didney|Icibalus|x | MinFM | Min | 11 | 48/24 | Standard | After Mad17 | Osieorb18 | |Steve Miller's the Joker|Osie+Chloe|13|48/24|SFM|After Sorc|DatBird |Bastard scp FM|Emilia+KyoDaz|18|48/24|Special FM|After Joker|Geyde |Risky Light Game, Featuring Rain|katze|13|48/24 (maybe 72/24)|Standard|After Min|Osieorb18| |Dicey Dungeons FM|EliThePsycho + some nerd|15|48/24|Special|After SCP|Osieorb18| |Fol 31: This ones got a D1 Exe|DatBird|17|48/24|FOL|After Dicey|FOL Balance Team|Dat if he wants to do alts |Questions FM|Zone_Q11|13|48/24|Special|x|Icibalus |RuPaul‚Äôs Drag Race: All Stars Season ???|GGhana|17|48/24|Vanilla (MU)|???|Osieorb18 |Deus Ex: Enemy Within 5|Frostwolf103 + CRichard|18|48/24|Special|x|Osieorb18 |A Certain Scientific Railgun Mafia|Prophylaxis|19|48/24|SFM|x|Osieorb18 |Sussy Jungle Oligarchy|Geyde|13|48/24|Vanilla|Signups|Icibalus|x
[color=ligblue]In Review[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Host(s)]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**| | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |SFoL 69 ùïüùïöùïîùïñ: üÖñüÖ°üÖêüÖùüÖì üÖòüÖìüÖîüÖê|Geyde|16+|48/24| SFoL|x|Future DatBird| |Yandere and Companies Mafia|Trustworthy Liberal|16| 48/24|SFM|x|Arete |Mafia Trials|Twil1ight|9|48/24|Vanilla|x|sulit |Cultists vs The Reformed|Trustworthy Liberal|15|48/24|Vanilla|x|Geyde |FE7: The Blazing Blade Mafia | Mercenary | 17 | 48/24 | Special|x|sulit |[color=red]**BASTARD SWORD**[/color] - Alice‚Äôs Super Ultra Mega Nonsensical Bastard Game whose Mechanics and Flavor make no Sense Whatsoever but for Some Fucking Reason Alice wants this Game to be a Balanced Singleball Game with no Conversions. She is Probably High as a Kite but Fuck it, what could Possibly go Wrong so May as Well Join. Plus it‚Äôs not Like You‚Äôre Using Your Time Productively so in and Play, or in and Slank and when you Get Pushed Just Self-Vote and AtE II: Electric Boogaloo - the Return of the Mafia - the Jester Strikes Back, Much to Icibalus‚Äô Chagrin|Alice|27|48/24|Bastard Minimash|x|Datbird| |Hydra Popcorn: Forumer Cat Flavor|Marshal|22(11 hydras)| 24/0|VFM|x|x |Wild West Forum Mafia 2: Everything's bigger in Texas|Italy + Marshal|50|12/12|VFM|x|x
[color=ligblue]Work In Progress[/color] - [details=WIP] **[Game Name]**|**[Host(s)]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Reviewer]**| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |Evo Mafia 2|sulit|12-14|48/24|Standard| |Officiant Grand Idea|ChopChop|20|48/24|Standard| |Dragalia Lost: Shattered Timeline|Insanity|24|48/24|Minimash |Warrior Cats Signup Thread Mad34|GGhana|34|12/12|Minimash(MU) |Danganronpa on the Clocktower|thepigeonnyc|14|48|Misc |History UPick|clonedcheese|lmao|48/24|UPick| | CIRCUS CITY BURDEN OF SECRECY CLOWN FIESTA |GGhana + Logic|8|72/48|Special(MU)|x|x| |Puzzle Competition|Arete|1-infinity|24|Misc |Danganronpa v69: Killer Clowns|GGhana|15|48/24|Vanilla (MU) |Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors|Dat|9|Ambiguous|Misc| |FBR2|Whysper|10-20|24|Misc |BTD6FM|Wazza&Dat|21|48/24|Special|Geyde |Civilization Mash| Alice + poor schmuck that she's gonna get to cohost| 30+|48/24 |Minimash| |Countries FM - The First Great War|Wazza + Eevee| 20-24|36/12|Minimash| |Needlessly Tagged|Wazza + Amelia|16|48/24|SFM|Osieorb18 |Rokugan FM 2|Mercenary|???|48/24|SFM| Geyde| |Fyre|Aelin|18|A game that focuses on the fact that you all are murderous maniacs and feeds you bloodlust. Cheaper than therapy!|When the games ready |Your Turn to Die| Alice| 20| A game that's a mixture of puzzles and social deduction, based on the VN of the same name.| When the games ready |Blood on the Forums XI|thepigeonnyc + hopefully others|Max 20|Blood on the Forums but polished to be fit for the Forums.|June |Ori and the Will of the Wisps Mafia|Mistyx|18|48/24|SFM |BOTF ???: Ultra Fish Bucket|Intensify|5 - 15|Unknown|Misc |Minority Rule Royale 3: Automated|thepigeonnyc's bot|Infinity|24|Misc|thepigeonnyc ;)
[/details] [color=ligblue]Misc[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Host(s)]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Small Description]**|**[Start Date]**| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |Island Adventure|Wazza + Emilia|12|An Island Adventure Game that totally won't cause you to kill and betray your friends|Dec 2 or later| |Dungeon Master|Aelin|16|A Champion-centric round-based PvP game, sorta like Forum Battle Royale if you played that|ASAP| |Coup: Uprising|EliThePsycho|5-8 (may be stretched)|Coup, a bluffing game to be the last one standing, but different!|x|
Miscs do not have to go through review to be placed in the misc queue, but should be posted as a reply regardless. The misc queue exists to visualize the placement of your game. Each user may have only 1 misc queued at a time. Reviewers/mods reserve the right to not allow your game to run.
